exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n, k : nat Hle : (n <= k)%nat Unable to unify "a (k - n)%nat" with "(fix PS_incr_n (a : nat -> V) (n k : nat) {struct n} : V := match n with | 0%nat => a k | S n0 => PS_incr_1 (PS_incr_n a n0) k end) a n k".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n, k : nat Hlt : (k < n)%nat Unable to unify "zero" with "(fix PS_incr_n (a : nat -> V) (n k : nat) {struct n} : V := match n with | 0%nat => a k | S n0 => PS_incr_1 (PS_incr_n a n0) k end) a n k".

original: unfold PS_incr_n. destruct (le_lt_dec n k) as [Hle | Hlt]. - apply eq_refl. - reflexivity.
